t: AWS Shield - AWS WAF, AWS Firewall Manager, and AWS Shield Advanced
s: Protection against Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) attacks is of primary importance for your internet-facing applications. When you build your application on AWS, you can make use of protections that AWS provides at no additional cost. Additionally, you can use the AWS Shield Advanced ...

t: AWS Shield Advanced overview - AWS WAF, AWS Firewall Manager, and AWS Shield Advanced
s: AWS Shield Advanced is a managed service that helps you protect your application against external threats, like DDoS attacks, volumetric bots, and vulnerability exploitation attempts. For higher levels of protection against attacks, you can subscribe to AWS Shield Advanced.

t: AWS Shield Advanced metrics - AWS WAF, AWS Firewall Manager, and AWS Shield Advanced
s: Shield Advanced publishes Amazon CloudWatch detection, mitigation, and top contributor metrics for all resources that it protects. These metrics improve your ability to monitor your resources by making it possible to create and configure CloudWatch dashboards and alarms for them.
